=== Additional Information ===
We will be celebrating the release of Ubuntu Gutsy Gibbon at the Meehan's in Roswell. If you plan on attending, please add yourself to the attendee list below including the number of guests you plan to bring. 

Under 21 individuals are welcome at Meehan's. 

Meehan's has free wifi.

=== Attendee List ===
Add yourself to the list below if you would like to attend the release party. If you plan on bringing guests, please add the number in the "Guests" column, otherwise leave it blank. Please update the "Total Attending" as well.
